widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Lawyer Directory Services-Filtering:
config.description: The new filtering feature allows Justia Lawyer Directory users to easily find lawyers who provide particular services in a practice area, providing them with a better user experience as well as more opportunities for our lawyers to stand out.

config.title: Automated QA for Mailing Newsletters:
config.description: We continue automating our quality assurance efforts, this time, we are adding support for email marketing campaigns such as the JLD and Client newsletters, the marketing blasts, JLD monthly report, and our welcome series.

config.title: Release of the UniCourt Norm API Service:
config.description: This won't bring any noticeable changes in the short term, but we are working towards building a more up-to-date JLD lawyer database, and this is one step in that direction.

config.title: Jurist Search Upgrade:
config.description: jurist.org is a legal news and commentary blog powered by Justia. We recently upgraded the search feature to provide a better user experience, which will allow Jurist to reach more audiences.
